entry.title: oleksiizozulenko/performance-scripts-demo
entry.summary:
Scripts for running performance tests

== Running scenarios ==

Performance (Load) did as simple as possible. Base principle - just one environment in one time but it's possible to run different scenarios.

== Script run-tests.sh command line arguments == All command line arguments have formant [parameter]=[value]

{| class="wikitable" border="1" cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0" width="100%" ! align="center" style="width:200pt; " scope="col" | Parameter ! style="width:100pt;" scope="col" | Description

|- | --results-dir | Directory where to save results '''default:''' ${user.home}/performance-results/ ''tip:'' when you didn't set results dir and default directory not found then all resutls will be stored in folder [ dirname run-scripts.sh]/results/

|- | --users | How many virtual users will be started. '''default:''' 10

|- | --duration in seconds | How much time scenario will be running. '''default:''' 15 min

|- | --rampup in seconds | How much time jmeter start threads. Used for calculate load profile. '''default:''' 1 sec

|- | --delay in seconds | Startup delay. How much time jmeter wait before start scenario. '''default:''' 0

|- | --scenarios | Names of scenarios for run. You can set few space-separated. Example --scenarios="TestScriptName1 TestScriptName2 TestScriptNameN". '''default:''' run-all

|- | --env-id | Benchmark site id. Configured in config.properties file in format ''' bmk.host.[bmk.id].id ''' where this bmk.id you will set as --env-id property This parameter is required

|- | --perf-host | dns of bmk server where serverAgent is running. '''default:''' nis1-dev2.srvlanlocal

|- | --perfmon | Enables Performance monitor plugin '''default:''' true

|- | --perf-port | port for serverAgent. '''default:''' 4545

|- | --loadosophia | Enables Loadosophia plugin. '''default:''' false

|}

==== Example: ====

/bin/bash run-tests.sh --users=15 --duration=3600 --env-id=1 --scenarios="TestScriptName1 TestScriptName2"

will run scenarios '''TestScriptName1''' and '''TestScriptName2''' on environment with id 1 ( bmk1host1.example.com ) for 1 hour and 15 parallel threads (virtual users)

=== For Windows Workstantions === For windows workstantion you can use next command for running scenarios

[your repository location]\tools\ant\bin\ant.bat -DANT_OPTS="-Xmx5128m -Xms1024m" -Drun.env.id=[your env.id] -Dresults.dir=[your results folder *required] -Duser.count=[your users count] -Drun.duration=[your run duration] [space separated names of scenarios]

==== Example: ====

C:\alex\obb-performance\tools\ant\bin\ant.bat -DANT_OPTS="-Xmx5128m -Xms1024m" -Drun.env.id=1 -Dresults.dir=./results/ -Duser.count=5 -Drun.duration=300 TestScriptName

== Parameters that can be changed during runtime == {| class="wikitable" border="1" cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0" ! align="center" |Parameter ! Description

|- | '''user.count''' | amount of virtual users (your load profile). This parameters equals to --users in run-tests.sh

|- | '''run.duration'''
| how much time should scenario run. This parameters equals to --duration in run-tests.sh

|- | '''perf.monitor.server''' | server where located tested site. '''default:''' my.perf.site

|- | '''perf.monitor.port''' | port of perfmon agent. '''default:''' 4444 ; ''Tip:'' for my.perf.site use 4545

|- | '''is.upload.loadosophia''' | If you want to upload to Loadosopia (this requires loadosophia token and project. Note: Read about Loadosophia.org Uploader plugin), '''default''': true

|- | '''is.enable.perf.monitor''' | If you want to enable monitoring server metrics. (this plugin requires serverAgent is running. Note: Read about Performance Monitor Plugin for JMeter). '''default''': true

|}

== Parameters for scenarios ==

You can set some parameters into any scenarios for run them on special cases. Just put additional properties file next to your Scenario file All scenario specified properties are depends on benchmark site and should be stored in file with name

[scenario name].bmk[bmk.id].properties

==== For example: ====

TestScriptTamplate.bmk1.properties will set category and product id for bmk1host1 site

== Reporting ==

For reporting uses two parts: '''html''' file and [https://loadosophia.org/ ]

Html reports generates and sends automatically to [your_email].

If reports uses default mount share when they will be appeard on [your_performance] servers. Links to them you will see in email body.
